summary: Barium peroxide is a chemical compound.
full_text: Barium peroxide is the inorganic compound with the formula BaO2. This white solid  is one of the most common inorganic peroxides, and it was the first peroxide compound discovered. Being an oxidizer and giving a vivid green colour upon ignition , it finds some use in fireworks; historically, it was also used as a precursor for hydrogen peroxide.
title: Barium peroxide
